elements.content: Synthesis, structures and photoluminescence of a series of 3D lanthanide–organic coordination polymers constructed from versatile 2,2′-bipyridine-3,3′-dicarboxylic acid 1,1′-dioxide and oxalic acid† Lijuan Zhang Hongwei Zhu Yan Guo Yunshan Zhou Qing Yue and Zonghai Shi 1–34567899a–d1011–14159e1617a R 1 = ∑‖Fo| − |Fc‖/∑|Fo|.bwR2 = ∑[w(Fo2 − Fc2)2]/∑[w(Fo2)2]1/2.18Experimental powder X-ray diffraction patterns of the samples of as-prepared compounds 1 (blue line), 2 (green line), 3 (red line), 4 (pink line) and 5 (dark blue line), and the standard pattern (black line) obtained from the single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis of compound 1.

elements.content: Scheme 1 Various coordination modes of the bdcd2− reported in literatures (a–e) and in this work (f).
elements.clean_text: Scheme 1  Various coordination modes of the bdcd2- reported in literatures (a-e) and in this work (f).

elements.content: Various coordination modes of the bdcd2− reported in literatures (a–e) and in this work (f).The 1-D infinite chain composed of Eu3+ ions and ox2− ligands in the ac plane (a), the 2-D layer composed of 1-D chains in the ac plane (b), the 3D open framework structure composed of 2-D layers with lattice water molecules as occupiers inside the 1-D channels along the a direction (c), 3D topological representation with a (38·49·54) (37·49·511·6) topology viewed along the a direction (d) in compound 1. (Color code: C, black; Eu1, turquoise; Eu2, teal; N, blue and O, red for Fig. 4a–c. Red node, four-connected Eu1 ion; pink node, four-connected Eu2; blue node, four-connected bdcd2− ligand; and yellow node, two-connected ox2− ligand for Fig. 4d). Lattice and coordination water molecules for Fig. 4a and b and all H atoms for all the figures were omitted for clarity.
elements.clean_text:
Various coordination modes of the bdcd2- reported in literatures (a-e) and in this work (f).

The 1-D infinite chain composed of Eu3+ ions and ox2- ligands in the ac plane (a), the 2-D layer composed of 1-D chains in the ac plane (b), the 3D open framework structure composed of 2-D layers with lattice water molecules as occupiers inside the 1-D channels along the a direction (c), 3D topological representation with a (38⋅49⋅54) (37⋅49⋅511⋅6) topology viewed along the a direction (d) in compound 1. (Color code: C, black; Eu1, turquoise; Eu2, teal; N, blue and O, red for Fig. 4a-c. Red node, four-connected Eu1 ion; pink node, four-connected Eu2; blue node, four-connected bdcd2- ligand; and yellow node, two-connected ox2- ligand for Fig. 4d). Lattice and coordination water molecules for Fig. 4a and b and all H atoms for all the figures were omitted for clarity.

elements.content: Fig. 4 The 1-D infinite chain composed of Eu3+ ions and ox2− ligands in the ac plane (a), the 2-D layer composed of 1-D chains in the ac plane (b), the 3D open framework structure composed of 2-D layers with lattice water molecules as occupiers inside the 1-D channels along the a direction (c), 3D topological representation with a (38·49·54) (37·49·511·6) topology viewed along the a direction (d) in compound 1. (Color code: C, black; Eu1, turquoise; Eu2, teal; N, blue and O, red for Fig. 4a–c. Red node, four-connected Eu1 ion; pink node, four-connected Eu2; blue node, four-connected bdcd2− ligand; and yellow node, two-connected ox2− ligand for Fig. 4d). Lattice and coordination water molecules for Fig. 4a and b and all H atoms for all the figures were omitted for clarity.
elements.clean_text: Fig. 4  The 1-D infinite chain composed of Eu3+ ions and ox2- ligands in the ac plane (a), the 2-D layer composed of 1-D chains in the ac plane (b), the 3D open framework structure composed of 2-D layers with lattice water molecules as occupiers inside the 1-D channels along the a direction (c), 3D topological representation with a (38⋅49⋅54) (37⋅49⋅511⋅6) topology viewed along the a direction (d) in compound 1. (Color code: C, black; Eu1, turquoise; Eu2, teal; N, blue and O, red for Fig. 4a-c. Red node, four-connected Eu1 ion; pink node, four-connected Eu2; blue node, four-connected bdcd2- ligand; and yellow node, two-connected ox2- ligand for Fig. 4d). Lattice and coordination water molecules for Fig. 4a and b and all H atoms for all the figures were omitted for clarity.

| Final R indexes [I ≥ 2σ(I)] | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0454, wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.0655 | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0353, wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.0617 |
| Final R indexes [all data] | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0684, wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.0734 | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0454, wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.0664 |
| Largest diff. peak and hole/e (Å<sup>−3</sup>) | 0.967 and −1.453 | 1.243 and −1.386 |
| CCDC no. | [1041082](http://xlink.rsc.org/?ccdc=1041082&msid=c5ce00479a) | [1041081](http://xlink.rsc.org/?ccdc=1041081&msid=c5ce00479a) |
| a[^a] | R<sub>1</sub> = ∑‖Fo| − |Fc‖/∑|Fo|. wR<sub>2</sub> = ∑[w(Fo<sup>2</sup> − Fc<sup>2</sup>)<sup>2</sup>]/∑[w(Fo<sup>2</sup>)<sup>2</sup>]<sup>1/2</sup>. |
| b[^b] | wR<sub>2</sub> = ∑[w(Fo<sup>2</sup> − Fc<sup>2</sup>)<sup>2</sup>]/∑[w(Fo<sup>2</sup>)<sup>2</sup>]<sup>1/2</sup>. |

[^b]: b

cln_elements.content: Fig. 4 The 1-D infinite chain composed of Eu3+ ions and ox2− ligands in the ac plane (a), the 2-D layer composed of 1-D chains in the ac plane (b), the 3D open framework structure composed of 2-D layers with lattice water molecules as occupiers inside the 1-D channels along the a direction (c), 3D topological representation with a (38·49·54) (37·49·511·6) topology viewed along the a direction (d) in compound 1. (Color code: C, black; Eu1, turquoise; Eu2, teal; N, blue and O, red for Fig. 4a–c. Red node, four-connected Eu1 ion; pink node, four-connected Eu2; blue node, four-connected bdcd2− ligand; and yellow node, two-connected ox2− ligand for Fig. 4d). Lattice and coordination water molecules for Fig. 4a and b and all H atoms for all the figures were omitted for clarity.
cln_elements.clean_text: Fig. 4  The 1-D infinite chain composed of Eu3+ ions and ox2- ligands in the ac plane (a), the 2-D layer composed of 1-D chains in the ac plane (b), the 3D open framework structure composed of 2-D layers with lattice water molecules as occupiers inside the 1-D channels along the a direction (c), 3D topological representation with a (38⋅49⋅54) (37⋅49⋅511⋅6) topology viewed along the a direction (d) in compound 1. (Color code: C, black; Eu1, turquoise; Eu2, teal; N, blue and O, red for Fig. 4a-c. Red node, four-connected Eu1 ion; pink node, four-connected Eu2; blue node, four-connected bdcd2- ligand; and yellow node, two-connected ox2- ligand for Fig. 4d). Lattice and coordination water molecules for Fig. 4a and b and all H atoms for all the figures were omitted for clarity.

metadata.title: Synthesis, structures and photoluminescence of a series of 3D lanthanide–organic coordination polymers constructed from versatile 2,2′-bipyridine-3,3′-dicarboxylic acid 1,1′-dioxide and oxalic acid
